long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ToolsStartpage, a feature-packed Chrome extension that enhances your browsing experience with a variety of useful basic tools and a visually stunning start page. With ToolsStartpage, you can customize your Chrome start page background, access Google apps with ease, and take advantage of a convenient tools bar for improved productivity.

Key Features:

-> Beautiful Start Page Background: Enjoy a visually captivating start page background that adds a touch of elegance to your browsing experience.

-> Quick Access to Google Apps: Easily access your favorite Google apps directly from the extension. Save time and navigate seamlessly between services like Gmail, Drive, Calendar, and more.

Handy Tools Bar: Boost your productivity with a versatile tools bar conveniently located on the left side of your browser window. The tools include:

-> Timer: Set a timer for up to 59 minutes and 59 seconds, complete with an alarm to keep you on track.

-> Stopwatch: Use the stopwatch feature for timing various activities or projects, with the ability to run for hours.

-> To-Do List: Stay organized by creating and managing tasks within the extension. Keep track of pending tasks and mark them as complete.

-> Image Resizer and Compressor: Easily resize and compress images for optimized web usage, saving both storage space and bandwidth.

-> Units Converter: Simplify everyday conversions with a comprehensive unit converter, enabling quick and accurate conversions between different units.

-> Pomodoro Functionality: Take advantage of the built-in Pomodoro technique in timer, which alternates between 25-minute work sessions and 5-minute breaks. The extension provides an alarm to signal the end of each session, ensuring a balanced and productive workflow.

-> Date and Time Display: Press the Escape key to reveal a dedicated page displaying the current date and time. Pressing Escape again returns you to the previous state, seamlessly integrating this functionality into your browsing experience.
